hero.headline: Stop Managing Pain. Start Your Transformation.
hero.subheadline: The 12-week biomechanical blueprint by Dr. Aris Thorne.

about.title: Dr. Aris Thorne
about.subtitle: The Catalyst
about.bio1: A biomechanical architect with 15 years of experience treating elite athletes and high-performing executives.
about.bio2: Dr. Thorne's 'Catalyst Method' rejects the traditional 'rest and ice' model, instead utilizing data-driven stress-loading to rebuild the body's structural integrity. He believes recovery is a performance metric, not a clinical chore.
about.motto: Stop managing pain. Start your transformation.
about.expertiseDesc: Trusted by Olympic athletes, professional sports teams, and Fortune 500 executives for biomechanical optimization.
about.datadrivenDesc: Every protocol is built on biomechanical analysis, tissue adaptation science, and measurable performance metrics.
about.resultsDesc: 15 years of transforming chronic pain into peak performance across diverse populations and performance goals.

phase1.title: Phase 1: Ignite
phase1.subtitle: Relief & Inflammation
phase1.description: Rapid pain reduction through targeted tissue mobilization and neurological re-education. Establish baseline measurements for your biomechanical audit.

phase2.title: Phase 2: Rebuild
phase2.subtitle: Functional Mobility
phase2.description: Progressive loading protocols adapted to your tissue capacity. Regain full movement patterns and athletic confidence.

phase3.title: Phase 3: Sustain
phase3.subtitle: Peak Performance
phase3.description: Advanced performance optimization. Long-term resilience protocols to prevent regression and exceed previous limitations.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes. While we are not in-network with most providers, we provide detailed invoices for direct reimbursement. Dr. Thorne's protocols are backed by peer-reviewed biomechanical research, qualifying for many insurance plans under 'rehabilitation services.'
faq.q2: How much time does this actually require?
faq.a2: Only 15 minutes per day. The Catalyst Method prioritizes efficiency over duration. Each protocol is designed for integration into your existing routine—no gym membership required.
faq.q3: Why is the Catalyst Method different?
faq.a3: Most physiotherapy is pain management. The Catalyst Method is performance architecture. We don't just fix the problem; we rebuild your body to perform beyond your previous capacity. Every exercise is data-driven and progression is measurable.
faq.q4: What if I have a complex injury history?
faq.a4: That's exactly who benefits most. Dr. Thorne specializes in multi-system injuries and chronic pain cases that haven't responded to traditional approaches. Your complexity is your advantage.
faq.a5: You receive a lifetime maintenance protocol and access to quarterly check-ins with Dr. Thorne. The program ends, but your transformation continues.
faq.a6: Yes. Initial assessment is in-clinic for movement analysis. Follow-ups are available remotely via video. Complete customization based on your location and preferences.
